alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:03PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Nassau and northeastern Duval Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 303 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oceanway, or near Jacksonville International Arpt. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville International Arpt, Yulee and Oceanway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
